Blog.post: not to fear, the nice people in the deli downstairs have given me 2 hotdogs and 3 Otis Spunkmeyer cookies! Woo HoOOO!!!!! They saw I was scrounging for change and said, nonono, here you go. But they're Chinese, so it sounded like Row Row Row You're Boat..... I dunno...... Talk soon....

boy o boy, $15.00 to live on today. 10 of it went to the gas tank, and the other 5 went to a soda, a bag of chips, and excedrin migraine. oy, no lunch today! Thank God for TrimSpa, lol. Hope dinners good tonight honeeeee.... lol

[follow up] Sorry the last post was so short, was in the middle of a lecture. Just finished 2 labs, now am having a nic fit, and eagerly waiting to go home to the family. t minus 1 hour 10 minutes and counting.
Just dropping a quick note for the people out there who love me... lol

welp, I'm in class right now, and just finished our review. Our instructor is cool, and knows a crap load. Going camping with the kids this weekend in the great outdoors of my parents fenced in backyard. WOO HOO, hope we don't get eaten by bears or anything. Stay tuned....
Well, welcome aboard folks, this is the start of the trip, so let's see where this takes us. My name is JR and I run Thuzzy Computers a little computer repair thing.

Hey everyone. Just a quickie today, lots of work to do here in the orbiting HQ. I'm going to cut the grass and TRY to setup some lights that I purchased a few weeks back. These are the kind of lights that you see in a persons yard that make their sidewalk look like a model airplane runway. ALSO, comments are now turned on, so anyone can comment on each and every blog I post... and I redesigned the template. So tell me what you think....
Hey y'all. Just a quick note for those of you who care. busy busy busy, but you know I love you honnneeeeeee

Well, another day, another big FAT $0.00!!!! Hopefully business will start picking up and I can take the kids camping somewhere OTHER than my moms backyard! Speaking of my mom, she had a run-in with a popular fat lady's clothing store this weekend, and she came out the loser. It makes me wonder how many other people have frustrations like this? Let's see, how can we put something together, like a bulletin board, where everyone in the known world can access it, and keep it cheap? *gasp*, the internet! Will investigate what domains are available, more news to follow.... BTW, Love ya honey..... Hope The Boy's ok...
